hero.title: Industry Immersion Series
hero.paragraph1: $100,000+ in micro grants and incentives available to grade 7-12 students (and their educators) across Canada.
hero.paragraph2Bold: The first activity is now live! Scroll down
hero.paragraph2Rest: to learn how the program works, and view open activities.
hero.paragraph3: And join the mailing list so you and your students are the first to know how to get involved.
